spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout roughly matches (living/dining left, kitchen/utility top, toilet center-top, bedroom right, balcony bottom-left). However, the wet-area block (toilet/utility) partitioning and access geometry appear simplified/shifted versus the 2D plan (E2/E4). Entry door condition at the top-left is not represented clearly in 3D, affecting circulation accuracy (E1). Door swing/orientation for internal doors (notably toilet) appears inconsistent with the 2D swing direction (E3). Window/opening positions are not consistently traceable to the 2D plan (toilet/utility/side openings) (E2). Some room size relationships (kitchen vs utility vs toilet) look proportionally off compared to labeled dimensions (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency is mostly preserved (kitchen near living, utility near kitchen, toilet near utility, bedroom off living). But the 3D omits/unclearly depicts the main entry door and likely simplifies door framing/embedding (E1/E2). The wardrobe/closet element shown on the 2D plan along the bedroom’s upper wall is not modeled (E1). Interior partition layout around toilet/utility does not faithfully reproduce the 2D wall breaks/door locations (E2/E4). No clearly hallucinated extra rooms, but several openings appear added/changed relative to the plan (E5 risk on windows/openings).

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture is present and broadly placed correctly (sofa/coffee table in living, dining table in living/dining zone, bed in bedroom). Some items from the 2D (e.g., bedroom built-in/wardrobe, smaller decor placements) are missing or not aligned to plan intent (E1/E2). Scale looks generally consistent, but circulation clearances differ due to partition/door deviations (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is acceptable and readable. Projection is not strictly orthographic (perspective present), but still consistent. Lighting is flat but adequate. Geometry is generally clean; however, door/window detailing is minimal/ambiguous, reducing clarity for verification. Composition is clear with good separation from background.

detected_errors.description: Main entry door at the top-left shown in the 2D plan is missing/unclearly represented in the 3D render.
Bedroom wardrobe/closet element indicated on the 2D plan (hatched built-in along the bedroom upper wall) is not modeled in 3D.
Toilet/utility partition layout and access points appear shifted/simplified compared to the 2D plan, altering exact wall breaks and openings.
Toilet door swing/orientation does not match the 2D plan’s indicated swing direction.
Window/opening placements (especially around toilet/utility and side walls) are not consistently matched to the 2D plan and appear relocated/changed.
Relative proportions between kitchen, utility, and toilet appear distorted versus the labeled 2D dimensions (utility/toilet sizing relationship not preserved).
